title: Battlestar Galactica Blood and Chrome Trailer 3 Mixes 1080p
description:
Battlestar Galactica Blood and Chrome Trailer 3 Mixes 1080p
V: 2-Pass Encoding (Turbo first pass) Preset = 09 (very slow) AVC
A: 2.0 160Kbps AAC source was lossless FLAC

The first leaked Wondercon trailer for Blood and Chrome was about 90 seconds long with 1/2 second clips and it was set to a shortened version of the cover of Led Zeppelin's Immigrant Song from The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo by Karen O, Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross. The trailer quickly leaked on to the Internet and by Monday night 2012.03.19 the trailer had over 100,000 YouTube views. Take down notices removed these copies starting Wednesday 2012.03.21.

This post shares 3 versions of the Blood and Chrome trailer, all of which use a lossless FLAC version of the O-Reznor-Ross Immigrant Song cover for the music:
1) the original leaked trailer, a 1080p streaming web video
2) a frame for frame replica of the original trailer using a blu-ray source
3) a version that uses extra clips so a full length version of the Immigrant Song cover is used

All 3 versions of the audio are beat matched identically with the original so the scene changes are paced with the song.

Battlestar.Galactica.Blood.and.Chrome.Trailer.Streaming.1080p.mkv
